titles.title: CB 172 You Are My All In All

properties.copyright: 1991 Shepherd's Heart Music, Inc., Administered by Word Music Group, Inc.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
YOU ARE MY STRENGTH WHEN I AM WEAK,
You are the treasure that I seek,
You are my all in all.
Seeking You as a precious jewel,
Lord, to give up I'd be a fool,
You are my all in all.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Jesus, Lamb of God,
Worthy is Your name,
Jesus, Lamb of God,
Worthy is Your name.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Taking my sin, my cross, my shame,
Rising again, I bless Your name,
You are my all in all.
When I fall down You pick me up,
When I am dry You fill my cup,
You are my all in all.
